title: What is the Relationship between Magic and the Impersonal Law of Forces in Esotericism?
first_phrase: In this final section, the author discusses the laws of cause and effect in esotericism, emphasizing the importance of having a comprehensive understanding of the interconnection of all things. The author explains that when they cause a reaction, it can potentially impact someone else's life positively or negatively, depending on their own path. They argue that this simultaneity of action is a part of the larger, non-human justice of the "law of entities." The author also addresses the misconceptions about magic and highlights the seriousness it requires.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the idea that magic is just a matter of performing mechanical operations is a widespread equivocation. To better understand its nature and potential, one should compare it to the most basic creative processes of the mind, recognizing the complexity and freedom of the entities it interacts with. Only in this perspective, it might reveal a fascinating and useful tool for expanding one's vision of reality.
